messages.message: The other big one they continue to harp on is... Hand writing detection, just simply is there handwriting on the page or not.
you can see it on the mint board, this feature is being developed, we don’t have the POC yet as we’re still in the data generation phase. How soon do they need it
POC wont be for another month probably
by next friday, we’re hoping to be able to say with a POC if we can guarantee this with some confidence or not

Going to continue peppering this with questions, I know we are currently working on multi-lingual, safe to tell HSBC yes:
- English
- Simplified/Traditional Chinese
- French
- Spanish
- Other
- Mixture of languages (e.g. English mixed with Chinese)
- Can the tool translate text into different languages?
